definition: next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: The division of the city grew out of the zones of occupation established at the end of World War II.
sentences.chinese: 二次大戰結束時形成的戰領區導致了該城的分裂。

sentences.english: The current recession is already among the deepest of the post-World War II period.
sentences.chinese: 美國目前的經濟衰退是二次大戰以來最嚴重的。

sentences.english: Muslims and Buddhists appeared on the scene after World War II.
sentences.chinese: 穆斯林與佛教徒是在二次大戰後纔在美國出現的。

sentences.english: Then, Sparky spent two years in Europe during World War II.
sentences.chinese: 於是，在二次大戰期間，史巴奇在歐洲待了兩年。

pinyin: Di4 er4 Ci4 Shi4 jie4 Da4 zhan4

definition: Pacific War between Japan and the US, 1941-1945

pinyin: Er4 ci4 Shi4 jie4 Da4 zhan4

definition: to forfeit sovereignty and humiliate the country (idiom)/to surrender territory under humiliating terms

pinyin: Di4 yi1 ci4 Shi4 jie4 Da4 zhan4
